dct_description_sm: This polygon data layer represents public lands for Colorado in 2003. The dataset was originally published by the Colorado Department of Transportation on Decemebr 31, 2003.[Features in this dataset represent general land ownership by categories. These categories include: Private ownership, State Land Board, US Forest Service, National Park Service. Features are represented by polygon geographic shapes. This layer is also known as 'land status'.]
